alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 8:36PM EDT until April 19 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Newton County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Lake County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Momence, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lake Village, Roselawn, Shelby, Schneider, Thayer and Sumava Resorts. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 233 and 239. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
